bit.name: Consist Address (0-127)
bit.description: Stores consist address. Range 0-127 (direction set in bit 7)

bit.name: Loco Direction In Consist
bit.description: A consist address over 127 will also set this bit

bit.name: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse

relation.value: Enable CV Lock as set in CVs 15 and 16
Reset all CVs to default values at next power cycle

bit.name: Hyperlight Flash Rate (0-15)
bit.description: 0 is fast, 15 is slow, 4 is recommended for start

bit.name: Grade Crossing Hold Time (0-15)
bit.description: 0-15 seconds

bit.name: F11 Braking Rate (0-127)
bit.description: Additional braking when Fll activated (combined with CV4)

relation.value: Add value to baseline braking rate (increases braking delay)
Subtract value from baseline braking rate (decreases braking delay)
